text:
Annulo-aortic ectasia with DeBakey type II dissecting aneurysm in Gaucher's disease.
 Annulo-aortic ectasia is an extremely rare complication of Gaucher's disease.
 We report successful surgery in a patient with Gaucher's disease complicated by annulo-aortic ectasia and aortic dissection.
 Cabrol's operation was accomplished without bleeding or sternal adaptation problems.
